altername_name: Happy Cooking: Touch Pen de Tanoshiku Oryouri
name: Happy Cooking
overview: Be the Best Cook Around! Play through a culinary adventure where you cut, stir, and fry your way to the top! Test your skills as you master a variety of tasty dishes. Unlock special modes and mini-games through competitions, quizzes, and more. Use your stylus as the ultimate kitchen tool and run your kitchen the way you like it!
